alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Southeast Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:20PM EST until February 17 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation, with a mix of light freezing rain and sleet. Sleet accumulations of a coating, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Hamilton, Warren, northern Fulton, and northern Saratoga Counties of eastern New York. * WHEN...From 11 PM Wednesday to 6 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Untreated ground surfaces may become slippery and treacherous.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow...sleet...or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities...and use caution while driving.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Southeast Warren
